name: Japan Living Simulator
description:
Date girl. Buy Anime. Live a life. Accurate to Japan.

This is Japan Living SImulator. You live to breath. Breath to live. The girl you love is in love but needs anime. 17 anime. Only you can do task and make yen to get dream girl. Live in an accurate Japan world and speak to the Japanese people. E to speak to them and E to dialogue. Very Esy.
